### Signals in [{{category}}](#`r tolower("{{pathogen}}")`-{{category}})

<!-- Gauge colour: less than 10% = primary, less than 50% = warning, else = danger -->

```{r}
n_signals <- signals_agg %>% dplyr::filter(category == "{{category}}")
max_signals <- nrow(n_signals) * params$number_of_weeks
gauge(
 value = sum(n_signals$n_alarms),
 min = 0, max = max_signals,
 label = paste("Signals in last", params$number_of_weeks, "weeks"),
 sectors = gaugeSectors(
   success = c(0, 0.1*max_signals),
   warning = c(0.1*max_signals, 0.5*max_signals),
   danger = c(0.5*max_signals, max_signals),
   colors = c("primary", "warning", "danger")
 )
)
```
